fields.name: Ascetics of Frost (C1)
fields.value: When the Herald of Frost hits an enemy marked by a Fortune-Preserving Talisman, Qiqi regenerates 2 Energy.

fields.name: Frozen to the Bone (C2)
fields.value: Qiqi's Normal and Charge Attack DMG against enemies affected by Cryo is increased by 15%.

fields.name: Ascendant Praise (C3)
fields.value:
Increases the Level of Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Divine Suppression (C4)
fields.value: Targets marked by the Fortune-Preserving Talisman have their ATK decreased by 20%.

fields.name: Crimson Lotus Bloom (C5)
fields.value:
Increase the Level of Adeptus Art: Herald of Frost by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Rite of Resurrection (C6)
fields.value:
Using Adeptus Art: Preserve of Fortune revives all nearby fallen characters and regenerates 50% of their HP.
This effect can only occur once every 15 mins.
